messages.subject: 'educational TV'
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry about the last post,  I hit return,  oops. As I ve said before, before unschooling I would never have considered letting my children watch unlimited TV,
messages.messageBody:
Sorry about the last post, I hit return, oops.



As I've said before,

before unschooling I would never have considered letting my children watch unlimited TV, maybe PBS, but not even that!



Well, this morning Kyra, 5dd, was watching Cartoon Network (this was really a channel that I didn't think could be educational before unschooling).



On Sylvester and Tweety, they talked and showed how an orchestra/band is recorded for a CD; showed the control room with the workers and how they could turn up different instruments parts and all the mechanics behind it.



I was in shock!



Kelli





---------------------------------
